description:
Producer prices of heating oil

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
61241 Index of producer prices of industrial products

Definition:
Producer prices of heating oil are selling prices of
domestic producers of heating oil, expressed in
euros/hectolitre, applicable on the 15th day of the relevant
month, excluding turnover tax, and including mineral oil
tax, ecological tax and oil storage contribution.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: Producer prices of heating oil
